name: King Tut's Tomb Adventure
description: King Tut's Tomb Adventure is a typical text adventure game in which the goal is to score 175 points by collecting treasure. In the game the player starts outside a big pyramid with nothing but some food, some matches and a torch. It's up to the player to explore the massive tunnel systems inside the pyramid in order to find all the treasures.
alsoFor: Apple II, Commodore PET/CBM, TRS-80 | Combined View
